description: Baseline inspection of perimeter firewalls for policy drift and expired rules.
purpose_output_goal: Detect unauthorized firewall rule changes within tenant perimeter.
data_sources: FortiGate REST API; Tenantra Agent syslog collector
auth_strategy: Service account with read-only API token stored in Vault
expected_artifacts: JSON report of rules, diff summary
success_criteria: API reachable, diff computed, results persisted
dependencies_notes: Outbound HTTPS allowed to firewall; rules export enabled
preconfig_requirements: Register firewall device and API token via Admin UI
rollback_plan: Disable module via admin UI and alert SOC

description: Collects configuration snapshots from core switches and validates checksum.
purpose_output_goal: Ensure switch configurations match golden templates.
auth_strategy: Per-device API user with rotated password
failure_modes: SSH connection refused, diff engine error
dependencies_notes: Golden template stored in Tenantra object storage
preconfig_requirements: Register device host/IP, credentials, template reference
rollback_plan: Revert to last known good config via CLI

description: Enumerates cloud assets across AWS accounts and updates Tenantra CMDB.
purpose_output_goal: Maintain authoritative inventory of instances, buckets, and databases.
auth_strategy: OIDC role assumption via Tenantra identity
success_criteria: Asset delta persisted, CMDB counts match
dependencies_notes: Tenant provides AWS account IDs and OIDC trust
preconfig_requirements: Setup cross-account IAM role; configure region list
rollback_plan: Restore previous CMDB snapshot from backup

description: Audits privileged accounts across AD and cloud directories.
data_sources: Azure AD Graph; On-prem AD via LDAP
auth_strategy: Managed identity for Graph, LDAPS service user
dependencies_notes: LDAPS connectivity required; Graph app registration
preconfig_requirements: Register tenant directories and OU scopes
rollback_plan: Disable module and notify IAM team

description: Monitors critical server processes against baseline and flags drift.
purpose_output_goal: Alert on missing or unexpected critical processes.
rollback_plan: Revert to last baseline and suppress alerts
